Package io.mrshannon.hexmek.models

Class HexMap

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.mrshannon.hexmek.models.HexMap
  • public class HexMap
extends Object
    Class that represents rectangular map with hexagonal tiles.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      HexMap​(int width, int height, Tile baseTile)
      Construct a map.
      HexMap​(int width, int height, Tile baseTile, Map<Hex,Tile> tiles)
      Construct map with special tiles.

    • Constructor Detail

      • HexMap

        public HexMap​(int width,
              int height,
              Tile baseTile)
        Construct a map.
        Parameters:
        width - width of map
        height - height of map
        baseTile - base tile for map, all tiles will have this type

      • HexMap

        public HexMap​(int width,
              int height,
              Tile baseTile,
              Map<Hex,Tile> tiles)
        Construct map with special tiles.
        Parameters:
        width - width of map
        height - height of map
        baseTile - base tile for map, all tiles not mentioned in tiles will have this tile type
        tiles - special tiles to place on the map

    • Method Detail

        public int getWidth()
        Get width of map.
        Returns:
        width of map in hexes

      • getHeight

        public int getHeight()
        Get height of map.
        Returns:
        height of map in hexes

      • getTile

        public Tile getTile​(Hex hex)
        Get terrain tile at the given hex.
        Parameters:
        hex - coordinate to retrieve terrain tile for
        Returns:
        the terrain tile that is at the given hex

      • isHexValid

        public boolean isHexValid​(Hex hex)
        Determine if a coordinate is valid (within the map).
        Parameters:
        hex - coordinate to check
        Returns:
        true, if the given hex is within the map
